info.title: API
info.description:
Platnova's Business API allows businesses to issue virtual accounts and cards to their employees, vendors, or retail customers. It allows businesses to streamline the process of issuing cards, manage spending, and track transactions. The API documentation provides information on how to integrate our virtual card issuing system into a business's existing systems and outlines the features and functionalities of the API, including card and account creation, management, and reporting. It also provides technical specifications, such as API requests, responses, and authentication processes. The API documentation is intended for developers and IT teams to use in order to effectively implement Platnova solutions into their business processes. # Authentication/Authorization To access any of the resources on the `{BaseUrl}/v1/`, the client has to pass pre-defined headers for authentication and authorization. The API is secure and only authorized clients can consume the service. There are API keys assigned to every business. ## API Key Requests may acccept an api key either in the request headers or as a query parameter. Some requests cannot be authorized using an API key. ``` json X-API-KEY: ``` OR ``` json ?api-key= ``` # Base URL Live - [https://api.platnova.com
](https://api.platnova.com)Sandbox - [https://sandbox.api.platnova.co](https://sandbox.api.platnova.co) # Errors Unauthorized API key ``` json { "status": false, "data": {}, "error": [], "message": "unauthorized access" } ``` Permission Denied ``` json { "status": false, "data": {}, "error": [], "message": "unauthorized access: permission denied" } ```

post.description:
This API allows for the creation of a new individual customer profile. This includes necessary identification details, address, financial information, and additional KYC (Know Your Customer) compliance data. The response will confirm successful creation or return relevant errors based on data validation.

# Usage

To create a customer, make a POST request to the API endpoint, supplying all required details in the request body. This API is for onboarding individual customers and verifying their identity as part of KYC compliance.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves detailed information about an **individual customer** based on their unique `id`. It allows you to view the customer's profile, including status, accepted terms, and KYC-related capabilities.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to retrieve.

post.description:
Create a virtual account.  
  
The beneficiary_account_id is the wallet id of a business account that is to be linked to the virtual account being created. This is typically the wallet id of your funding account which can be found on the dashboard.
